message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. To kick things off, I'm proposing a starting price of $18,000. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $15,000?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget considerations, but $15,000 is a bit too low for me to consider.  Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $16,500?
Hello Alice, thank you for your follow-up offer. I've considered your proposal, but I'm still aiming to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $15,000?
